scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run copy:assets && npm run copy:html
scripts.build:html: cp index.html dist/index.html && sed -i '' 's|\./dist/styles\.css|./styles.css|g' dist/index.html && cp imprint.html dist/imprint.html 2>/dev/null && sed -i '' 's|\./dist/styles\.css|./styles.css|g' dist/imprint.html 2>/dev/null || true && cp privacy.html dist/privacy.html 2>/dev/null && sed -i '' 's|\./dist/styles\.css|./styles.css|g' dist/privacy.html 2>/dev/null || true && cp quote.html dist/quote.html 2>/dev/null && sed -i '' 's|\./dist/styles\.css|./styles.css|g' dist/quote.html 2>/dev/null || true && cp robots.txt dist/robots.txt 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.preview: npm run build && npm run serve
